content: this is a chart only overlay mosaic crochet pattern knowledge of how to do overlay mosaic crochet is suggested but really easy to learn finished size 40 x 50 i used a size j hook with red heart super saver yarn in white- 2 jumbo skeins ombre blue-tiful - 2 skeins ombre scuba - 1 skein you can use any yarn and hook size you d like just know the size may differ than mine i have included a one page file for the entire chart as well as a files for each section of row of blocks if you need the image to be a little bigger i have also included an optional topper row that says alphabet if you want your blanket to be a little bit taller as well as a couple different heart options i cant wait to see all your creations if you come across any errors or have any questions about the pattern don t hesitate to send me a message
